bibl.title: A Divine Palimpsest: Cults from Classical to Hellenistic Cyprus.
bibl.note: Offers an overview (based mainly on inscriptions) of the Greek, Phoenician and Egyptian cults in Cyprus during the classical and hellenistic periods.

bibl.title: From Evagoras I to the Ptolemies: The Transition from the Classical to the Hellenistic Period in Cyprus. Proceedings of the International Archaeological Conference, Nicosia, 29-30 November 2002.

bibl.seg: Anastassiades Aristodemos, A Divine Palimpsest: Cults from Classical to Hellenistic Cyprus.

Pavlos Flourentzos (Ed.), From Evagoras I to the Ptolemies: The Transition from the Classical to the Hellenistic Period in Cyprus. Proceedings of the International Archaeological Conference, Nicosia, 29-30 November 2002 (Nicosia, 2007) pp. 161-172, figg.
Offers an overview (based mainly on inscriptions) of the Greek, Phoenician and Egyptian cults in Cyprus during the classical and hellenistic periods.
